-  <script>
+  <script>
     const heroImages = document.querySelectorAll('.hero-img[data-local-src]');

-    // Lightweight carousel controls
+    // Lightweight carousel controls + dynamic caption/teaser updates
     document.querySelectorAll('.carousel').forEach((car)=>{
-      const slides = Array.from(car.querySelectorAll('.slide'));
+      const slides = Array.from(car.querySelectorAll('.slide'));
       const dots = Array.from(car.querySelectorAll('.dot'));

-      const setIndex = (i)=>{
+      const brandEl = document.getElementById('brand');
+      const titleEl = document.getElementById('title');
+      const sizeEl = document.getElementById('size');
+      const cCountEl = document.getElementById('cCount');
+      const cQEl = document.getElementById('cQ');
+      const cAEl = document.getElementById('cA');
+
+      const applyFromSlide = (slide)=>{
+        if(!slide) return;
+        const { brand, title, size, comments, q, a } = slide.dataset;
+        if(brandEl) brandEl.textContent = brand || '';
+        if(titleEl) titleEl.textContent = title || '';
+        if(sizeEl) sizeEl.textContent = size || '';
+        if(cCountEl) cCountEl.textContent = comments || '0';
+        if(cQEl) cQEl.textContent = q || '';
+        if(cAEl) cAEl.textContent = a || '';
+      };
+
+      const setIndex = (i)=>{
         index = (i + slides.length) % slides.length;
         slides.forEach((s,si)=>s.classList.toggle('active', si===index));
         dots.forEach((d,di)=>d.classList.toggle('active', di===index));
+        applyFromSlide(slides[index]);
       };
@@
-      // Swipe support
+      // Swipe support
       let startX = null;
@@
-    });
+      // Initial apply
+      applyFromSlide(slides[index]);
+    });
   </script>
